title: LimX Dynamics unveils TRON 2 shape-shifting limbed robot
description:
The TRON 2 modular tri-form robot supports dual-arm, wheeled, and bipedal configurations for integrated VLA research and development.

The post LimX Dynamics unveils TRON 2 shape-shifting limbed robot appeared first on The Robot Report.
